main event: A witness observed a long red streak crossing the stars at high altitude from Mitchell AFB, NY on August 18, 1959.
interesting points: The object was described as having the length of a telephone pole., The object had a bright red color and faded out to the east., The sighting lasted for approximately one minute., The witness reported a V/seal path when crossing the stars., The counter report suggested it might be a high diving aircraft or balloon.
sighted object: long red streak in the sky
witness description: Witness observed the object while waiting in a car, facing northwest.
